sentences: Gast Waltzing was born in the city of Luxembourg on 13 August 1956.
He began his music studies at the Conservatoire de Luxembourg when he was just 7 years old.
In 1982, he became Professor of Trumpet at the Luxembourg Conservatoire and in 1986 founded the school's Jazz Department, which he heads.
As a composer, he has recorded music for the Luxembourg film A Wop Bop A Lop Bop (1989), as well as for television.
In 2004, he founded WPR Records, which sets out to promote young musicians and has featured the Luxembourg National Jazz Orchestra.
In 2008, Waltzing was appointed jazz director at the Echternach International Music Festival.
